name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Infigrowth SEO Extension: Technical and On-Page SEO

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✔️On-Page SEO Overview: Gain a clear understanding of how well your webpage content is optimized for SEO. This overview shows how well each part of your content, from headers to keywords, is optimized, making it easy to spot opportunities for improvement.

🌐Domain/Web Page Overview: Get an at-a-glance view of your domain or webpage’s SEO health, including key metrics for improving page performance with the help of insights.

🔠Header Tags Analysis: Analyze your header tags (H1, H2, H3 etc) to ensure proper hierarchy and relevance, boosting both readability and SEO.

🖼️Images Optimization: Check for Alt text, Old Format, Large Images, Image size to improve user experience and page rankings.

🔗Links Analysis: Identify internal and external, Do-follow and No-follow links to optimize your website performance. 

🔍N Gram Keyword Analysis: Understand how keywords and phrases are used on your page, identifying opportunities to improve keyword density and content relevance.

🛠️Technical SEO Checklist: Diagnose and fix technical SEO issues related to Schema Tags and Hreflang  that could be hindering your search rankings.

📊Core Web Vitals: Track and improve your site’s Core Web Vitals, ensuring faster load times, better interactivity, and an overall improved user experience for mobile users.


📄 On-Page SEO

🏷️Title and Description: Review and optimize your page title and meta description to ensure they are keyword-rich, relevant, and aligned with search intent.

🔠Header Tags (H1-H6): Analyze your header tag structure to ensure they follow best practices, with proper keyword use and logical content hierarchy.

🖼️Images: Verify that all images include alt text, are appropriately sized, and load efficiently, helping you improve both SEO and accessibility.

🔍Keyword N Gram: Break down the most common keywords and phrases on your page to ensure proper usage and keyword density across the content.

🔗Meta Keywords and Links: Ensure your meta keywords are relevant and your links are properly structured to optimize crawlability and search engine understanding. 

📄Word Count: Analyze word count to ensure your content is comprehensive enough to rank highly, while avoiding fluff or unnecessary padding.

🖋️Author and Publisher: Ensure the author and publisher information is available and properly tagged to meet E-A-T (Expertise, Authority, Trustworthiness) standards.

🌍Language: Confirm that your page’s language is correctly declared to improve user experience and SEO targeting in specific regions.


⚙️ Technical SEO

🤖Robots.txt and Sitemap: Analyze if Robots.txt file and XML sitemap is available for your site. 

🔄Canonical: Identify canonical issues and ensure the correct page versions are indexed, preventing duplicate content penalties.

⚠️Status Code: Review HTTP status codes to identify 404 errors or 301 redirects that may harm user experience and rankings.

🚫Meta Robot and X Robot Tags: Identify meta and X-Robots tags for your domain. 

📱Core Web Vitals for Mobile: Optimize your website’s performance for mobile devices with a detailed analysis of Google’s Core Web Vitals metrics.

🏷️Schema Tags: Ensure your pages are enriched with proper schema markup, helping search engines understand your content and enabling rich search results.

🌐Hreflang: Check Hreflang tags to ensure that your site targets the correct language and regional audience.

📢Open Graph: Optimize your social sharing presence with Open Graph tags, ensuring that your content looks great when shared on platforms like Facebook and Twitter.


❓ Why Choose Infigrowth?

🛠️Comprehensive SEO Tool: Covers every aspect of SEO, from on-page elements to complex technical audits.

📊Easy-to-Use Interface: Simplifies the SEO process with a user-friendly dashboard and actionable insights.

⏱️Real-Time Monitoring: Track your SEO performance in real time and get actionable recommendations for improvement.

📱Mobile Optimization: Focus on both mobile SEO with an emphasis on Core Web Vitals for superior performance.
